verbose_text: DeNicola et al reported that Nrf2 was in high expression state in various cancer cells, and Nrf2 could decrease the intracellular ROS generation, remove the free radicals in cells, moreover, cancer cells could not proliferate without Nrf2 expression, therefore, ROS also can inhibit cancer cell proliferation.
evidence: Nrf2 could decrease the intracellular ROS
